attributes.description:
Seller Comments
All cars are mechanically checked and Dekra certified. Test Drives are available and welcome subject to availability. Nationwide deliveries can be arranged. We buy and will trade-in your car. On floor finance and insurance manager (NCA & FSB approved). Balance of factory warranty and/or comprehensive warranties available. Balance of motorplan on vehicles which qualify. Finance available through the majority of the financial institutions. With over 65 years of managerial retail experience, we are here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery.

2015 BMW X3 xDRIVE35i  A/T (F25)
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.

Mechanical Breakdown Warranty

attributes.description: Contact the Group 1 Sales team by filing in the form, we typically call you back within a few minutes. Look out for our call from the 27 600 number. We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices. One of our Sales consultants can come too you in the comfort of your own home or at your place of work so that you can view the car in a nonpressurized environment. We can arrange Nationwide delivery. All our cars undergo a Multipoint mechanical check to insure the best peace of mind. Become a part of the Group 1 Family today TsCs Apply. Call us on 021 903 0500
